author: matt-komm
body:
changes:
- removed old testing code concerning FastSim TrackerRecHit resolution (coded in CMSSW31X according to global tag of tests)
- removed old, unused & unusable code concerning Pixel/StripClusters in FastSim
- adapted FastSim TrackerRecHitProducer (aka SiTrackerGaussianSmearingRecHitConverter) to CMSSW plugin/library coding style

Since the removed code was unused & unusable, no regression is expected.
title: Cleanup fast sim clusters
